Fields: 
Link name from EKS.net
Item name in  Zotero (Zotero gets from remote site)
Index file name in Zotero folder
Folder name in Zotero library 
URL for archived site as it will appear in EKS.net

abbreviated as:
Link:   
Item:   
Index:  
Folder: 
URL:    http://evekosofskysedgwick.net/externals/life// [modify as necessary]


Link:   http://www.faculty.umb.edu/gary_zabel/Website/My%20Writings/BU%20Strike.pdf (or http://www.scribd.com/doc/26915090/The-Boston-University-Strike-of-1979 as was)
Item:   BU Strike.pdf
Index:  BU Strike.pdf
Folder: 6VNQA2TB
URL:    http://evekosofskysedgwick.net/externals/life/6VNQA2TB/BU Strike.pdf

Link:   http://linguafranca.mirror.theinfo.org/9902/yaffe.html
Item:   Lingua franca -- February 1999
Index:  yaffe.html
Folder: BMW3D6XV
URL:    http://evekosofskysedgwick.net/externals/life/BMW3D6XV/yaffe.html
